timeline.bodyText:
Can you please set java version property to 11 in perun-web-gui/pom.xml and set <sourceLevel>1.11</sourceLevel> for gwt-maven plugin in it?
It all seems to work, but settings in IDE are a bit confusing.

Module language level is displayed as 15.
GWT compiler used to run developer mode respect GWT facet settings of IDE, which are taken from that sourceLevel on project import/refresh and if its "auto", it falls back to Java 8.

IDE correctly prevents you to use newer java features, but I believe we would want to use Java 11 language features in whole GWT project, so we should specify it and it will align all IDE settings to Java 11 for that module.
timeline.author: zlamalp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,7 +43,7 @@
 	<properties>
 		<!-- property used by spring-boot-starter-parent project to define maven.compiler.source and maven.compiler.target
 		     properties that in turn are used by maven-compiler-plugin to specify java source and target version -->
-		<java.version>8</java.version>
+		<java.version>15</java.version>

timeline.message: set java.version and GWT sourceLevel to 11 for perun-web-gui module
